title: Electrical installations — Safety of battery systems for use with power conversion equipment

scope.primary: Safety and installation requirements for battery energy storage systems connected to power conversion equipment for a.c. and/or d.c. power supply
target_users: Installers of battery energy storage systems
scope.applications: Battery systems for use with power conversion equipment

key_committees.joint_committee: EL-042, Renewable Energy Power Supply Systems and Equipment
represented_organizations: Australasian Fire and Emergency Service Authorities Council

regulatory_context.application_timing: Regulatory authorities that reference this Standard in regulation may apply these requirements at a different time. Users should consult with authorities to confirm requirements.
regulatory_context.innovation_allowance: Not intended to discourage innovation or exclude materials, equipment and methods that may be developed in the future

technical_evolution.technology_basis: Material contained in this Standard is based on the best information available at the time of preparation
technical_evolution.future_updates: Expected to require ongoing updating to ensure safe installation and operation of battery energy storage systems as technologies evolve
technical_evolution.revision_process: Revisions may be made from time to time in view of developments, and amendments will be made when necessary

informative_components.purpose: Substantial number of informative components to increase knowledge and understanding in this new field of technology
informative_components.guidance_role: Information acts as a guide for interested parties

acknowledgments.iec_permissions: Permission to reproduce definitions from IEC Electropedia and IEC 62109-1:2010
acknowledgments.australian_energy_council: Permission to reproduce information from Electrical Arc Flash Hazard Management Guideline Diagram 18

safety_considerations.battery_technology_focus: Covers existing types of energy storage with allowance for future technologies
safety_considerations.risk_assessment: Acknowledges lack of detailed information on risks and failures for new energy storage technologies
safety_considerations.safety_priority: Designed to provide safety requirements for battery systems connected to power conversion equipment

integration_context.power_conversion_equipment: Specifically addresses safety of battery systems when connected to power conversion equipment
integration_context.ac_dc_applications: Covers both alternating current (a.c.) and direct current (d.c.) power supply applications
integration_context.system_integration: Addresses complete battery energy storage systems, not just individual components

compliance_framework.regulatory_reference: Standard may be referenced in regulations by various authorities
compliance_framework.timing_flexibility: Regulatory authorities may apply requirements at different times than publication date
compliance_framework.authority_consultation: Users must consult with regulatory authorities to confirm their specific requirements

technical_standards_evolution.living_document: Expected to require ongoing updates as battery technologies and understanding evolve
technical_standards_evolution.best_practices: Based on best available information at time of preparation
technical_standards_evolution.future_proofing: Designed to accommodate future technological developments
